text: 3. Na today I dey born.
label: Nigerian

text: 4. Abeg no disturb.
label: Nigerian

text: 5. Dem dey sell fish for market.
label: Nigerian

text: 6. I no dey understand English.
label: Nigerian

text: 7. You dey lie, she no dey here.
label: Nigerian

text: 8. Na me be that.
label: Nigerian

text: 9. Abeg help me carry bag.
label: Nigerian

text: 10. Dem no dey sell bread again.
label: Nigerian

text: 11. I don tire, I no dey go school today.
label: Nigerian

text: 12. You dey joke with me?
label: Nigerian

text: 13. Abeg wait, I dey come.
label: Nigerian

text: 14. She dey form girl, she no dey help person.
label: Nigerian

text: 15. Na wetin you dey find?
label: Nigerian

text: 16. Dem house dey too cost.
label: Nigerian

text: 17. Abeg give me pen.
label: Nigerian

text: 18. I dey feel headache.
label: Nigerian

text: 19. You dey talk nonsense.
label: Nigerian

text: 20. Dem no dey sell data again.
label: Nigerian

text: 21. Abeg help me switch on light.
label: Nigerian

text: 22. I no dey know am.
label: Nigerian

text: 23. You dey speak Pidgin well well.
label: Nigerian

text: 24. Dem no dey sell book for library.
label: Nigerian

text: 25. I don finish work, I dey go house.
label: Nigerian

text: 26. Abeg no make noise.
label: Nigerian

text: 27. You dey do well.
label: Nigerian

text: 28. Dem car dey park for outside.
label: Nigerian

text: 29. Na me be that one wey dey sing.
label: Nigerian

text: 30. Abeg give me money.
label: Nigerian

text: 31. I dey hungry, I wan eat.
label: Nigerian

text: 32. You dey form big man, you no dey help person.
label: Nigerian

text: 33. Na your pikin dey cry.
label: Nigerian

text: 34. Abeg no forget.
label: Nigerian

text: 35. I no dey believe wetin you dey tell me.
label: Nigerian

text: 36. You dey lie, dem no dey pay you double salary.
label: Nigerian

text: 37. Na him dey call you.
label: Nigerian

text: 38. Abeg no worry.
label: Nigerian

text: 39. I dey think about wetin I go do.
label: Nigerian

text: 40. You dey talk like mad man.
label: Nigerian

text: 41. Dem no dey sell pure water again.
label: Nigerian

text: 42. Abeg no vex, I no mean wetin I just say.
label: Nigerian

text: 43. I dey feel sick.
label: Nigerian

text: 44. You dey form teacher, you no dey know book.
label: Nigerian

text: 45. Na my pikin dat one wey dey play football.
label: Nigerian

text: 46. Abeg no mind am.
label: Nigerian

text: 47. I no dey sure say I go come.
label: Nigerian

text: 48. You dey form fine boy, you no dey help person.
label: Nigerian

text: 49. Na your friend dey wait for you.
label: Nigerian

text: 50. Abeg no forget to lock door.
label: Nigerian
